channel.title: [Emulous] Item Requirements [Emulous]
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape,
I want to add 100% perfect Item Requirements so that my server is really good and isn't some crappy 'make-shift' server. Can anyone tell me the best way to add Item Requirements for every Item that RuneScape has so I can have all the correct Requirements.
Thanks,
Skyro!

item.title: [Emulous] Item Requirements [Emulous]
item.dc:creator: @Onix Onix
item.description:
@Onix wrote:

The way it is now is probably in the item handler or itemdefs or something like that. It will have the item ID as the case and return the level needed to wear it (For most servers I have seen). You can either add all the items like this, or create a separate file to handle this, or even a configuration file if you really wanted to.

Read full topic
